Job Description

Company Overview

At Fidelity, we’ve been helping Canadian investors build better financial futures for over 35 years. We offer individuals and institutions a range of trusted investment portfolios and services - and we’re constantly seeking to find new and better ways to help our clients. As a privately owned company, we boldly embrace innovation in all areas as we continue to grow our business into the future.

Working with us means you’ll be part of a diverse and dedicated group of people who make a real difference for our clients and communities every day. You’ll have a wide range of opportunities to grow and develop your career in an inclusive environment where you’ll feel valued and supported to be your best - both personally and professionally.

The Opportunity

The Full Stack Developer Sr., Digital Product is responsible for helping to build and maintain Java and React.js applications. Capabilities for this role include being able to build applications in Java, using modern architectures; being hands on in Object Oriented Languages (Java or C#), Cloud Based Technologies (AWS), and Front-End Frameworks (React JS, Spring Boot, Spring React, Node.js); application coding based on design and specifications; and comfort working with application protocols such as JSON RPC, SOAP, and REST. The Full Stack Developer Sr. is responsible for having a strong aptitude for understanding complex business problems and translating their technical knowledge into practical, implementable solutions that will drive high impact business value. He/she will show technical leadership by implementing Proof of Concepts (POCs) using new and novel technologies and design approaches, and hand them off for implementation to other members of the team. He/she will work closely with other team members to maintain internal applications and develop new products and services.

What You Will Do

Contributing to team process of SDLC
Work with stakeholders, technology, and agile project managers to define business requirements for every scrum / project and map out end-to-end solutions.
Liaise with internal user groups as needed to effectively program applications based on business and systems requirements
Be an integral part of the Digital Application Development team focused on the effective development and support of internal and external facing applications.
Work collaboratively with peers and business partners to deliver high quality projects and innovative solutions
Product feature-level designs in collaboration with other technical stakeholders in accordance with platforms and design patterns
Ensures that functional specifications can be implemented technically while developing and innovating creative solutions
Balance application development requirements with existing architecture, and predict impact of decisions on future architecture
Implement feature level functionality in accordance with team processes and designs
Design, develop, enhance, modify, and maintain application code and software solutions based on specific business requirements.
Develop user interface components and implementing them following wellknown React.js workflows (such as Flux or Redux).
Implements the best practices of Agile and DevSecOps for development to deliver quality products predictably and consistently.
Develop unit tests to ensure high quality code and be accountable for the quality of the product delivered.
Completes documentation and procedures for installation and maintenance. May interact with users to define system requirements and/or necessary modifications

Provide technical leadership through delivery of complex proofs of concept and application architecture design

Advanced technical evaluation of new tools, systems, components, and processes
Deeply understanding business needs, and delivering proofs of concept in order to provide guidance to developers, teams and partners
Lead walkthrough of design artifacts to execution teams
To contribute to, and oversee, technical implementation of complex new problems

What We’re Looking For

5+ years of relevant experience
University degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics or equivalent workexperience
3+ years of Java development experience, using the latest SDKs and tools and frameworks such as Spring boot, spring JDBC, and Spring test
Experience interfacing with back-end applications using MQ, SOAP, RESTFUL services, and JSON.
Experience with PostgreSQL or similar SQL-based database systems.
Experience with React Native or mobile development is preference but not required
Experience in using Agile project management tools (JIRA), and CI/CD pipelines.
Experience developing cloud native solutions according to industry best practices
Strong written and verbal communication skills with the ability to present and comprehend technical details clearly. Must be able to demonstrate product demos to users and stakeholders, collect feedback and implement improvements

What You Will Bring

Strong planning and software implementation skills
Understanding of the importance of non-functional requirements include security,
performance, and data management
Experience in both user interface and API implementation
Excellent communication and leadership skills, both written and oral
The ability to drive consensus amongst key stakeholders

Fidelity Canada is an equal opportunity employer

Fidelity Canada is committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive workplace. We will consider all qualified applicants for employment regardless of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national or ethnic origin, age, disability, family status, protected veterans’ status, Aboriginal/Native American status or any other legally-protected ground.

Accommodation during the application process

Fidelity Canada welcomes and encourages applications from people with disabilities. Accommodations are available on request for candidates taking part in the selection process. If you require an accommodation, please email us at FidelityCanadaStaffing@fidelity.ca.

No telephone inquiries or agencies please. We thank all applicants for their interest, please be advised that only those selected for an interview will be contacted.
